name: .CTV File Extension
summary: Learn about .CTV files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Project file created by Citavi, a Windows reference management application; stores citation data about information sources and can also include written notes; used for storing and searching research source information.

content: Citavi version 3 now uses .CTV3 files for projects.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
